resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14680</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Città, acqua / fiume, mare</string>
            <string language="en">Cities,water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Städte, Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villes, l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidades, água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόλεις, ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudades, agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Un esercizio di abbinamento. Molte città famose sono situate sulle rive di un fiume o vicino al mare. Questa esercitazione intende verificare la conoscenza di questi luoghi.</string>
            <string language="en">A match exercise. Many famous cities are located on the banks of a river or near the sea. This exercise is to test the knowledge of these locations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Übereinstimmung Übung. Viele berühmte
Städte sind auf den Bänken von einem Fluß oder nähern sich dem 
Meer. Diese Übung soll das Wissen dieser Standorte prüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice d'allumette. Beaucoup de villes 
célèbres sont situées sur les banques d'un fleuve ou s'approchent 
de la mer. Cet exercice doit tester la connaissance de ces 
emplacements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício do fósforo. Muitas cidades 
famosas são ficadas situadas nos bancos de um rio ou aproximam o mar.
Este exercício deve testar o conhecimento destas posições.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση αντιστοιχιών. Πολλές διάσημες πόλεις
βρίσκονται στις όχθεις ενός ποταμού ή πλησιάζουν στη θάλασσα. 
Αυτή η άσκηση είναι να εξεταστεί η γνώση αυτών των 
θέσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio del emparejamiento. Muchas 
ciudades famosas están situadas en las baterías de un río o acercan
al mar. Este ejercicio es probar el conocimiento de estas 
localizaciones.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-16</string>
            <string language="en">12-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Molte città famose sono situate sulle rive di un fiume o vicino al mare. In questo esercizio devi unire il nome della città con il nome del fiume che vi si trova.</string>
            <string language="en">Many famous cities are located on the banks of a river or near the sea. In this exercise you have to combine the name of the city with the name of the water, this city is located near.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
